name: Bone Wars :- Cope v Marsh
description:
During the late 19th century two men, Edward Drinker Cope and Othniel Charles March, held a bitter rivalry. Both sought to discover the most fossil species they could, willing to go to whatever lengths it took to beat the other.

It was the BONE WARS.

One player is on keyboard, the other on a gamepad. 
Keyboard controls --- Jump- space, Move - A/D, Attack and aim - Mouse

Gamepad controls --- Jump/Attack - Gamepad buttons, Move/Aim - D-pad or stick

Ordinary fossils are worth 1 point. Gold fossils are worth 10 points.

Crates contain dynamite and the golden pickaxe. Hit your opponent to make them drop fossils.

Springs send you back up to the top.
